name: tracesAPI
description: Get transaction traces and block trace data from 1inch Traces API. This function provides detailed transaction execution traces and block information. ALWAYS provide both 'endpoint' and 'chain' parameters - they are mandatory.

endpoint.description: REQUIRED: The traces API endpoint to call

examples.description: Get the synced block interval range for the chain
Get full trace data for a specific block (requires blockNumber)
Get trace data for a specific transaction by hash (requires blockNumber and txHash)
Get trace data for a transaction by its position in block (requires blockNumber and offset)

chain.description: REQUIRED: Chain ID for the blockchain network

blockNumber.description: Block number as string (required for getBlockTraceByNumber, getTransactionTraceByHash, getTransactionTraceByOffset endpoints)

offset.description: Transaction position/index in the block (required for getTransactionTraceByOffset endpoint)
